title: Hydra config & runbook for data capture pipeline
notes: Context: plume_nav_sim.cli.capture currently wires configuration via argparse and EnvironmentConfig dataclass. Deliverables: conf tree, wiring in CLI/runner, runbook doc section, and validation that hydra outputs deterministic configs under seed overrides.

title: CI guard: run capture pipeline + Pandera validation
notes: Context: Regression guard required to ensure capture pipeline stays valid. Deliverables: CI script/config, supporting test helper in tests/data_capture, documentation note linking to bd-152 manifest usage.
